item.text: After Moses the Lord’s servant died, the Lord said to Joshua son of Nun, Moses’ assistant:

“<st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> my <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> is <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st>. <st data-num="06258 06965">Get ready</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05674" class="">Cross</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">the</st> <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0859" class="">Lead</st> <st data-num="03605 02088">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am ready to <st data-num="05414" class="">hand over</st> to <st data-num="01121 03478">them</st>.<n id="3" />

I am <st data-num="05414" class="">handing over</st> to you <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04725 0834">place</st> you <st data-num="01869" class="">set</st> <st data-num="03709 07272">foot</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="01696 0413">promised</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>.<n id="1" />

Your <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">extend</st> from the <st data-num="04057" class="">desert</st><n id="1" /> in the south to <st data-num="03844 02088">Lebanon</st> in the north. It will <st data-num="05704" class="">extend all the way to</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="05104" class="">River</st> <st data-num="06578" class="">Euphrates</st> in the east (including <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0776 02850">Syria</st>)<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05704" class="">all the way to</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">Mediterranean</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st><n id="3" /> in the <st data-num="03996 08121">west</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> will be able to <st data-num="03320 06440">resist</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> of your <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st>. <st data-num="0834" class="">As</st> I <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>, so I will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you. I will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07503" class="">abandon</st> you <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05800" class="">leave</st> you <st data-num="05800" class="">alone</st>.

<st data-num="02388 0553">Be</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">strong</st> and <st data-num="0553" class="">brave</st>! <st data-num="03588 0859">You</st> must <st data-num="05157" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="05157" class="">in the conquest of</st> this <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="07650" class="">solemnly promised</st> their <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> I would <st data-num="05414" class="">hand over</st> to them.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="07535" class="">Make sure</st> you <st data-num="02388 0553">are</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">strong</st> and <st data-num="0553" class="">brave</st>! <st data-num="08104" class="">Carefully</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08451 0834">law</st> my <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">charged</st> you to keep.<n id="3" /> Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">swerve</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it to the <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> or to the <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st>, <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> you may <st data-num="07919" class="">be successful</st><n id="4" /> in <st data-num="03605 0834">all</st> you <st data-num="01980" class="">do</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> <st data-num="05612" class="">scroll</st> must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04185" class="">leave</st> your <st data-num="06310" class="">lips</st>.<n id="1" /> You must <st data-num="01897" class="">memorize</st> it<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03119" class="">day</st> and <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">so</st> you can <st data-num="08104" class="">carefully</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obey</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> that is <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> in it. <st data-num="03588 0227">Then</st> you will <st data-num="06743 01870">prosper</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="0227 07919">be successful</st>.<n id="5" />
I repeat, be strong and brave! Don’t be afraid and don’t panic, for I, the Lord your God, am with you in all you do.”
Joshua instructed the leaders of the people:

“Go through the camp and command the people, ‘Prepare your supplies, for within three days you will cross the Jordan River and begin the conquest of the land the Lord your God is ready to hand over to you.’”
Joshua told the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh:
“Remember what Moses the Lord’s servant commanded you. The Lord your God is giving you a place to settle and is handing this land over to you.

Your <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>, <st data-num="02945" class="">children</st>, and <st data-num="04735" class="">cattle</st> may <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">assigned</st> to you <st data-num="05676" class="">east</st> of the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River. But <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="01368 02428">warriors</st> must <st data-num="05674" class="">cross over</st> <st data-num="02571" class="">armed for battle</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead</st> of your <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>.<n id="1" /> You must <st data-num="05826" class="">help</st> them

until the Lord gives your brothers a place like yours to settle and they conquer the land the Lord your God is ready to hand over to them. Then you may go back to your allotted land and occupy the land Moses the Lord’s servant assigned you east of the Jordan.”
They told Joshua, “We will do everything you say. We will go wherever you send us.
Just as we obeyed Moses, so we will obey you. But may the Lord your God be with you as he was with Moses.
Any man who rebels against what you say and does not obey all your commands will be executed. But be strong and brave!”
